definitions.definition: ( US ) Ellipsis of pay raise ( “ an increase in wages or salary ” ) .
examples: The boss gave me a raise .

definitions.definition: ( curling ) A shot in which the delivered stone bumps another stone forward.
( poker ) A bet that increases the previous bet.
( mining ) A shaft or a winze that is dug from below, for purposes such as ventilation, local extraction of ore, or exploration.
( weightlifting ) A shoulder exercise in which the arms are elevated against resistance.

main_definition: ( US ) Ellipsis of pay raise ( “ an increase in wages or salary ” ) .

definitions.definition: A cairn or pile of stones .

main_definition: A cairn or pile of stones .
